Description: Bronze ladle with a duck's head terminal; the bowl is decorated with an engraved Wedjat-eye.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Curator's comments: Biblioraphy: D. Antoine and M. Vandenbeusch, Egyptian mummies. Exploring ancient lives, Sydney 2016, pp. 94-5.
